item.description:
we had such a fantastic sweaty good time at our last booty vortex meetup that we're doing it again.

booty vortex will be shakin' it up at the hard rock cafe on friday night, 29 may in a 9 p.m. show. if you like to dance all night, you'll be there shakin' it with them.

if you haven't been to a booty vortex show, browse the band's website to learn more about them and hear their music.

details:

this event will also be posted in at least three other meetup groups. please RSVP 'Yes' or 'Maybe' for only one group.

the hard rock cafe is in the faneuil hall area. see this hard rock website page for parking info and directions, including T access.

there's a $10 cover charge for this show and tickets may be purchased via TicketWeb. we're advising folks to buy tickets in advance for this show as booty vortex has drawn large crowds at this venue in the past. (note that TicketWeb also charges a 'service fee' in addition to the ticket price.)

i'll be making dinner reservations for 8 p.m., so please add a comment to your RSVP to let me know if you are interested in dinner.

looking forward to meeting you at the show!
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' by 29 may, 3 p.m.
item.name: booty vortex @ hard rock cafe
